casebody.data:
Wednesday, December 9,1998

MERIT DOCKET

98-2069. State ex rel. Miller v. Ohio Adult Parole Auth.

In Prohibition. On answer of respondent and on motion for summary judgment. Answer treated as motion to dismiss. Motion to dismiss sustained. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
